content.text:
Let me analyze the images and provide a detailed solution:

Main Target Image Analysis:
- Total Blocks: 6 blocks
- Colors: Blue (top), Green (middle), Red (center), Yellow (bottom/side)
- Layers: 4 layers vertically stacked
- Unique arrangement with some blocks partially offset

Block Dictionary Selection:
Required blocks from the dictionary (by index):
- Blue block (index 8): Two blue cubes on top
- Green block (index 12): Vertical green block
- Red block (index 1 or 2): Red block with curved cutout
- Yellow block (index 14 or 16): Horizontal yellow rectangular block

Assembly Instructions:
{
    Step1: Move block with index 14 (yellow horizontal block)
    Step2: Move block with index 10 (red cube)
    Step3: Move block with index 12 (green vertical block)
    Step4: Move block with index 8 (blue cube)
    Step5: Move additional block with index 8 (second blue cube)
}

The instructions follow the spatial arrangement seen in the target image, using the exact blocks from the dictionary without any rotation.
